channel.title: Mugo - Nomination
channel.description: სამშენებლო კომპანია, საპროექტო კომპანია, ინტერიერის დიზაინი, მშენებლობა, პროექტირება, დიზაინი

item.title: Restaurant "Kalaki" is nominated for A' Design Award and Competitions
item.description:
Restaurant "Kalaki" is nominated for A' Design Award and Competitions. A' Design Award is the worlds' largest and most diffused annual design competition.

Restaurant "Kalaki" is nominated for A' Design Award and Competitions.

A' Design Award is the worlds' largest and most diffused design competition reaching over 200 countries each year.

The Award is organized and awarded annually and internationally in a wide range of categories to create awareness for good design.

The mission of the A' Award and Competition is to provide a fair, ethical and competitive platform for companies, designers and innovators from all design fields with different experience levels, diverse disciplines and market focus to compete on, while providing them a global audience to showcase their success and talents to.

A' Design Award and Competitions, aims to highlight the excellent qualifications of best designs, design concepts and design oriented products.

A' Design Award and Competitions are organized and awarded annually and internationally in multiple categories to reach a wide, design-oriented audience.

Restaurant "Kalaki" is nominated in a category - A' Interior Space, Retail and Exhibition Design.
item.author: tinatin.tsivtsivadze@mugo.ge (თინა წივწივაძე)
